page.title: 02 KINGSWEAR MARINA
page.content: { Kingswear Marina}is situated on the River Dart near to Kingswear Station.It was built in 1975.The marina has four pontoons made of metal and wood.It is shaped like a capital E with an extra horizontal stroke.When the marina was built it could hold fifty boats.It can now hold 235 boats and there are plans for another hundred. The largest boat you can moore is sixty feet long and the only boats allowed on the marina are speedboats and yachts. It is expensive to moore your boat costing one pound per foot per week in 1985. Sam Cooke,Dan Harris, Tom Vincett.
